welcome_message_body: Welcome to Makassar, Indonesia! Get ready to be charmed by the city's rich history, bustling markets, and delicious seafood. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Makassar has to offer. Selamat datang!

restaurants.name: Ayam Goreng Sulawesi Ibu Tini
restaurants.description: Ayam Goreng Sulawesi Ibu Tini is a indonesian restaurant located in Makassar.
restaurants.address: Jl. G. Lompobattang No. 11, Makassar, Sulawesi Selatan

restaurants.name: Nyuk nyang roya
restaurants.description: Nyuk nyang roya is a indonesian restaurant located in Wajobaru.
restaurants.address: Jl irian (Jl irian no 3), Wajobaru, Sulawesi Selatan

restaurants.name: Sarabba Sungai Cerekang
restaurants.description: Sarabba Sungai Cerekang is a café located in Makassar.
restaurants.address: Jl. Sungai Cerekang, Makassar, Sulawesi Selatan

restaurants.name: Sop Saudara Irian
restaurants.description: Sop Saudara Irian is a soup spot located in Makassar.

restaurants.name: ON20 Bar & Dining Sky Lounge
restaurants.description: ON20 Bar & Dining Sky Lounge is a restaurant located in Makassar.
restaurants.address: Aston Makassar Hotel 20th Floor (Jl. Sultan Hasanuddin No.10), Makassar, Sulawesi Selatan 90111

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
